data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent:
Dad: Caleb, turn that radio off. It's ____ to ____ to ____.
Caleb: But Dad, I'm listening ____ the ____ game. It's ____ over! Can't I listen ____ the ____?
Dad: No, you ____ to ____ ready ____ bed ____. You have school in the morning.
data.partBlankContent:
Dad: Caleb, turn that radio off. It's ti__ to g_ to b__.
Caleb: But Dad, I'm listening t_ the base____ game. It's alm___ over! Can't I listen t_ the e__?
Dad: No, you ha__ to g__ ready f__ bed n__. You have school in the morning.
data.fullContent: Dad: Caleb, turn that radio off. It's time to go to bed. Caleb: But Dad, I'm listening to the baseball game. It's almost over! Can't I listen to the end? Dad: No, you have to get ready for bed now. You have school in the morning.
data.answer: 爸爸:凯勒，把收音机关掉。该睡觉了。 凯勒:可是爸爸，我在听棒球赛。快结束了!我不能听结尾吗? 爸爸:不，你现在必须准备睡觉。你早上要上学。
